fields.name: Basic Object Description
fields.question: Describe in one sentence what is shown in the image.

fields.name: Multilingual Short Caption
fields.question: Describe what is shown in the image in one short sentence in English and German. Please output both languages in the following format.

fields.name: List of Detected Items
fields.question: List the main objects visible in the image. Only return the list of objects, one per line, without any additional explanation.

fields.name: Multilingual Detail List
fields.question: Identify the three most important visual elements in the image and output them as a list with one item per line. For every item provide a translation in English, German and French.
